name: Bouncy Tappers
description:
This is my 2nd ever game, i made the first version in 2 - 3 days so don't expect too much. The game currently has 5 levels. You just have to click on the yellow cubes to move them, but sometimes clicking on them might result in something bad happening.

R - Reset Level

Space - Exit this stupid game

My youtube channel -https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8gsZ3nwsbZmM0se28wnUNw

Good luck!

Update includes: +1 level and post-processing effects.
